list.name: Default
list.comment:
10/02/2013
Most classes - Renamed variables to be in conformance to class member naming conventions.
Sentinel.java - DEVN4T23A11: Rearranged input parameters
SentinelShiftEndingActivity.java - DEVN4T38A18: added call to finish() to end the activity
SentinelDB.java - DEVN4T30A12, DEVN4T32A14: Refactored code to create JSON string from data in database - DEVN4T31A13: Referenced getReadableDatabase instead of getWritableDatabase

list.name:
Revert: 27/01/13
Reintegrated Alarms - alarm will now trigger alerting users when their shift is 5 minutes from ending
Alarm will cancel on logout
Fixed static value in ZXing activity
Ready for testing!
Rejected commit: Default
list.comment:
01/02/13
- Fixed issue with countdown timer being incorrect - Began to address issues with location services following first live data test - Service still does not seem to fully close on device - Somehow sent over 2000 rows of data, random groups of data of varying increments

task.summary: Default task

changelist.name:
Revert: 27/01/13
Reintegrated Alarms - alarm will now trigger alerting users when their shift is 5 minutes from ending
Alarm will cancel on logout
Fixed static value in ZXing activity
Ready for testing!

task.summary: 06/12/12 Commit
06/12/12 Commit
09/12/12 Commit
09/12/12 Commit

23/01/13
Lots done

23/01/13
Lots done

23/01/13
Added ZXing functionality Began adding calls to AssetService to record deliveries Modified authentication and login functionality

24/01/13
Added ZXing functionality

24/01/13
Added more ZXing functionality

24/01/13
fixed bug in location services - functionality now working. JSON string was SLIGHTLY incorrect in format.

26/01/13
Added in clock in/out functionality Adding alarms to ensure legal parameters are maintained
Broken!

26/01/13
Added alarms to trigger activities when the user is approaching the end of their shifts
Fixed previous issues.

27/01/13
Great deal of refactoring throughout all classes - House keeping, tidying up, making generic
Alarms have been disabled

27/01/13
Slight error in ClockIn/Out

28/01/13
First commit following testing on device. Following issues fixed:
- NoSuchMethodError thrown when using Notification.Builder. - Fix required downloading Android Support Libraries - Referenced NotificationCompat instead of Notification
- Multiple foreground services launched when closing/opening application and re-logging in. - App now checks for shared preferences when opening the SentinelLogin activity and automatically forwards to Sentinel activity.
- Multiple application icons resolved by removing android.intent.category.MAIN from manifiest file
- Application now correctly clears shared preferences when logging out

29/01/13
- Refactored entire application: - Sentinel is now the main application and starts an Intent for the Login Activity if there are no shared preferences stored - Break Activity is now a Service - problems with keeping the application in sync if user navigates away from the Activity

01/02/13
- Fixed issue with countdown timer being incorrect - Began to address issues with location services following first live data test - Service still does not seem to fully close on device - Somehow sent over 2000 rows of data, random groups of data of varying increments

03/02/13
!!!!!ALWAYS COMMIT CHANGES!!!!!
- Accidental deletion of a number of activities, almost losing 2 days of significant dev. Reverse-engineered from compiled .class files.
ACTUAL UPDATES:
- Ironed out various errors - location updates not shutting off - improved accuracy of tracking - various fixes to handle interrupts (orientation, back button, closing app) - Added in alerts if the user turns off GPS - Google Maps V2 API now in use - Google play services library added as a dependancy

03/02/13
!!!!!ALWAYS COMMIT CHANGES!!!!!
- Accidental deletion of a number of activities, almost losing 2 days of significant dev. Reverse-engineered from compiled .class files.
ACTUAL UPDATES:
- Ironed out various errors - location updates not shutting off - improved accuracy of tracking - various fixes to handle interrupts (orientation, back button, closing app) - Added in alerts if the user turns off GPS - Google Maps V2 API now in use - Google play services library added as a dependancy
I am daft.

03/02/13
!!!!!ALWAYS COMMIT CHANGES!!!!!
- Accidental deletion of a number of activities, almost losing 2 days of significant dev. Reverse-engineered from compiled .class files.
ACTUAL UPDATES:
- Ironed out various errors - location updates not shutting off - improved accuracy of tracking - various fixes to handle interrupts (orientation, back button, closing app) - Added in alerts if the user turns off GPS - Google Maps V2 API now in use - Google play services library added as a dependancy

03/02/13
Re-adding of subversion deleted files.
!!ALWAYS COMMIT CHANGES!!

03/02/13
Checking in google-play-services-lib dependency

03/02/13
Checking in google-play-services-lib dependency

05.02.13
- Sentinel.java - Built in error checking to ensure that the phone is capable of working with Android Google Maps V2 - Removed GPS dialogs, LocationService will do the alerting. - Added a dialog to warn the user they are logging out before their shift is ending. - Added error checking to ensure that the last location is not null (WILL BE REMOVING GETTING OF LAST KNOWN LOCATION)
SentinelNearingLegalDrivingTimeActivity.java - Refactored Notification slightly
SentinelOnBreakActivity.java - Refactored code slightly
GeotagDeliveryZXingActivity.java - Removed dialog, added Toast notifications
SentinelLogin.java - Added functionality to cancel the alarm set to alert drivers they are coming to the end of their shift when logging out. - Removed dialogs, added Toast notifications
ConnectionChangedBroadcastReceiver.java - Upon receiving connection changed info, will check if there is connectivity before reading any buffered information and sending it.
ConnectionManager.java - Is now abstract
ServiceHelper.java - Added two new methods to send data to location services
Utils.java - Added Utils class that will contain various pieces of functionality used throughout the application. Class will grow with refactoring.
SentinelSharedPreferences.java - Commented out functionality for next break and next break length - NEEDS TO BE RE-INTRODUCED
HistoricalGeospatialDataAsyncTask.java - New class to send historical data that is still in the buffer
SentinelLocationService.java - Added functionality to filter GPS updates, only sending if they are more accurate. - Added functionality to check of buffered historical data.

06/03/2013
Sentinel.java - Added notification alerting the user to login. - Removed determining last known location - causing all sorts of erroneous data on the map read outs. - Added functionality similar to in the foreground location service to check that updates are more accurate than the previous update.
SentinelLogin.java - Added checking for more robust feedback messages when user does not provide valid credentials.
Utils.java - Added functionality to check if location is more accurate than a previous (Refactored from location foreground service)
SentinelLocationService.java - Removed determining of last location - caused erroneous location read outs - Refactored code to check accuracy of the location and moved to Utils.java
SentinelMobileTest Module - Added test module (Uses Robotium)

06/03/2013
Sentinel.java - Modified methods to be protected rather than private for unit testing purposes.
SentinelLocationService.java - Added field to stop the service from attempting to be started in the foreground when unit testing (known issue, not a very graceful method)

06/03/2013
- Committing Testing module classes to subversion

08/02/13
- Sentinel.java - Implemented Intent extras - One to display a message on recreating the activity - One to determine whether or not to start the location service (fixes a bug in which location service was being removed and recreated in onPause) - Removed dialog for clocking out - replaced with Toast - Removed dialog for logging out - replaced with Toast - Fixed bug where logging out was displaying incorrect time until end of driving session - Added get/set methods for lastLocation object. Was breaking OO principles during Phase 1 testing.
- SentinelOnBreakActivity.java - Refactored logic, method names are much more self descriptive now - Simplified the logic. Currently drivers will only be able to clock out for 45 minutes after driving for 4.5 hours. - Modified performClockIn to take a string message to display in the main activity.
- SentinelLogin.java - Added a connectionchanged broadcast receiver to enable/disable logging in when there is no internet connectivity - Will implement a feature to allow a user to log in with temporary credentials when there is no connectivity - this will need some designing
- ServiceHelper.java - Added methods to execute two new async tasks for sending speeding and orientation notifications
- Utils.java - Refactored time string methods, now much nicer and more accurate. Probably less clunky than instantiating a Calendar object each time
- OrientationNotificationAsyncTask.java - New async task to send an orientation notification to the web service
SentinelLocationService.java - added two new methods to check the current speed and orientation of the device is and to issue notifications to the webservice and the user if they are determined to be incorrect.
- JsonHelper.java - Added getGeospatialJsonString method to return a json string representation of geospatial data and session info
- SpeedingNotificationAsyncTask.java - new class to send a speeding notification to the webservice
- SentinelTest.java - Added tests to test how device orientation affets the activity - Added tests to set a dummy location and ensure the location is reset
- SOME NEW FUNCTIONALITY IS UNTESTED - DO THIS!!

09/02/13
Sentinel.java - Moved start/stopLocationService to ServiceHelper.java - Moved performLogout to ServiceHelper.java - Added Speed broadcast receiver - MAY BE MOVED - Added additional parameter in onResume to check if the divers' shift is ending
SentinelOnBreakActivity.java - Added isJunit parameter to check if the activity is being tested or not.
SentinelShiftEndingActivity.java (Renamed from SentinelNearingLegalDrivingTimeActivity.java) - Changed entire structure of class - Synonymous with SentinelOnBreakActivity - Added parameters to allow the user to enter/exit the activity and have it resume correctly. - Sets an alarm if the user moves away from the activity so that they are alerted when their shift has ended. - Removed code to get Json string, using JsonBuilder method
AssetHelper.java - Deleted
AuthenticationHelper.java - New class, static methods for logging out - performLogoutWithDialog - shows a dialog to ensure user wishes to logout - performLogout - simply performs a logout
JsonBuilder.java (Renamed from JsonHelper.java) - Modified methods for new parameters - Added geoTaggedAssetJson - creates a Json string when geotagging a delivery
TrackingHelper.java - Moved start/stopLocationService to this class
GeospatialInformation.java - Removed methods that were unused
SentinelSharedPreferences.java - Added preferences to indicate if the shift is ending or has come to an end.
OrientationBroadcastReceiver.java - New class - Receives a broadcast when the user orients the device to landscape, sends an alert to the user and a notification to the webservice
OrientationNotificationAsyncTask.java - Added a constructor
SentinelLocationService.java - Added onConfigurationChanged listener to broadcast a message when the user tilts the device to landscape
SpeedingNotifiationAsyncTask.java - Added a constructor
SentinelTest.java - Testing clicking logout shows an alert dialog - Testing clocking out shows a notification - Testing clocking out after 4 1/2 hours allows clocking out

09/02/13
Time.java - New class with TIme constants for use in Sentinel
SentinelLogin.java - Added isJunit variable to aid testing
LoginHelper.java - Deleted, moved method to AuthenticationHelper.java
AuthenticationHelper.java - Added performLogin, method moved from LoginHelper.java
HttpResponseCode.java - renamed from ResponseStatusHelper

10/02/13
/layout - Played with layouts of activities and themes, adding a bit of (unnecessary) polish
/menu - Deleted redundant menu xml
/values - Added some new string values
Sentinel.java - Removed speeding broadcast receiver, this will be implemented at a later date (properly, too) - Added a check to ignore orientation changes when the ZXing scanner activity is launched (is landscape)
SentinelLogin.java - Changed connection changed ui logic around - less toast - Added function to alter the UI - Added isJunit check around driving end alarm - Made toasts shorter
SentinelLocationService.java - Added check to ignore config changes under certain conditions
Utils.java - Added error checking around string formatting methods - Modified upate accuracy checking, made more readable and self descriptive
